settings.heading: No secrets here
settings.text: From superfood sourcing and planet-friendly packaging to ethical responsibility and sustainability — we’re 100% transparent in everything we do.

Just straight up nutrition on a mission

Whether you’re an athlete or committed to an active lifestyle, our mission is to empower healthy living by bringing together all the best superfoods into a convenient, wholesome, and well-balanced meal — that’s good for you, and the planet.

settings.title: Honesty
settings.text: Transparency is non-negotiable — from farm to formulation and everything in between.

settings.title: Complete Nutrition
settings.text: Each sip is nutritiously complete with everything you need and nothing you don’t.

settings.title: Planet-Friendly
settings.text: We're nothing without nature. And we care for the Earth’s health as much as we do yours.

settings.title: Convenience
settings.text: Developed and formulated for busy lifestyles - just 2 scoops for a meal at home, work, or on the go.

settings.title: Darren O'Reilly
settings.text:
After 6 years as a professional rugby player with access to the best nutritionists, I left the sports fields for the corporate world.

I soon struggled to balance a busy lifestyle with essential nutritional needs. I wanted a healthy solution that tasted great too, and so I came up with Whole Supp: a delicious, nutritionally complete meal that’s good for both you and the planet.

settings.title: Dr Brian Carson
settings.text:
As our Head of Science and Innovation, I came up with Whole Supp’s Smart Food formulation and lead our scientific research studies.

I studied human metabolism, nutrition and exercise for 15 years and hold a PhD in physiology. The formulation consistent of 13 plant-based ingredients, including superfoods to support both performance and recovery.

settings.heading: Our ingredients
settings.text: Science doesn’t mess around. And neither do we. We work with leading experts in the fields of nutrition, science, medicine, and wellness so you can fuel good to feel great — daily.

settings.title: Compostable
settings.text: We have TUV compost certification for home composting.

settings.title: Recyclable
settings.text: We use non-toxic inks and all of our paper is sourced from managed forests.

settings.title: Zero food waste
settings.text: We have designed our products to eradicate any food waste.

settings.title: Sustainable
settings.text: We source our ingredients responsibly and ethically — locally and globally.

settings.heading: Nothing will ever harm you or the planet
settings.text: We’re serious about keeping you — and the planet — healthy, which is why we have zero tolerance for plastic packaging. In becoming as planet-friendly as possible, our pouches are home compostable while delivery boxes are 100% recyclable.

settings.heading: The superfood shake that packs a punch
settings.text:
A convenient shake to support your active lifestyle with
13 superfoods and 31g of protein. Oh, and it’s delicious.

Only £1.99 per meal.
